name: How To Make A Sail
description:
Made in less than 48 hours for the Random WikiHow Jam # 2.

Theme: "How To Make A Sail"

Instructions:

  1. Collect all the components necessary to make the sail, mast, and raft. (you can see your current inventory by clicking the arrow on the left side of the screen).
  2. Open the boat crafting menu using the arrow on the right side of the screen.
  3. Click each item in the boat crafting menu to craft it. Once you've crafted enough, that part of the raft will become built.

Congratulations! You've made a sail...and a raft.

Controls: WASD to move. SPACE to swing axe.
